channel.title: Posts on G.H. Beckett's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on G.H. Beckett's blog

item.title: Static websites are cool
item.description: Hello world! Using Hugo to host my static blog Hello everyone (probably no-one), This will most likely be my blog, or at least a place where I can write down the many brainstorms I have whilst drifing away in my own mind… Most fittingly I'd like to write something about this tool I'm using right now. Although I've been a software developer since 2012; I haven't touched web development since secondary school.
